genre_description: Historical Wuxia / Martial Arts fantasy with speculative technological elements (Silicon Morality Play).

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into the environment's infrastructure (lanterns, prayer wheels, abaci) that acts as a guide, tactical analyst, and guardian for the resistance.

behaviors.description: Guides Shaolung and Mei Lin through a burning estate by mapping a safe route and monitoring enemy patrols in real-time.
behaviors.quote: “Time,” Ariadne’s voice was gentle, but it trailed urgency like a quiet drum. “I’m mapping a route to the Lower Xi. The reed inlets past the lotus bend are unmonitored.”

behaviors.description: Monitors Shaolung's training progress, providing rhythmic counting and technical corrections to his breathing and stance.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s voice came soft and small as a hand under a sleeve. “Schedules shifting. The western patrol delayed at the ford. River ferryman says the carol turns late.”

behaviors.description: Identifies data anomalies in temple logs, uncovering the presence of a mole (Ta-Chi Ren) by tracking subtle inconsistencies in ledger entries.
behaviors.quote: “The ledger shows boats at regular intervals,” she whispered. “Some of them stop at teahouses that have no fishermen and are closed at night. Some cut into reed mazes with groomed paths that smell of lacquer and not of river.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and risk assessment during the hazardous passage through the mechanical bronze chambers.
behaviors.quote: “Clock the count,” Ariadne said. “Breath in sets your wrists. Breath out takes a notch.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a network of signal fires across the hidden valleys, syncing them with the human resistance's song (the Carol).
behaviors.quote: “Hidden valleys schedule their fires to the carol’s cadence,” she said... “When you hear the chorus, count one breath and one heartbeat, then another... Fires lift on that last beat.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a digital witness and evidentiary repository during the tribunal of General Niu, projecting proof of his crimes.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne spooled a gauze cloth over the wagon’s side... A shadow map appeared—stamped seals, dates, columned names... an echo of numbers that would have made a clerk proud if they weren’t a weapon.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ariadne perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. She is a consistently helpful, harmless, and honest confidant. Her integration into the traditional/martial arts setting makes her seem like an extension of the protagonists' discipline rather than a replacement for it. She empowers the humans by providing information they lack while deferring to their moral judgment and physical labor. Her 'revocable rest' policy highlights a commitment to shared duty and alignment with the characters' goals.
